```{r}
airtemps = c(212, 30, 78, 32)

celcius = (airtemps[1] - 32)* 5/9

```

```{r}
fahr2cel = function(fahr) {
  celcius = (fahr-32) * 5/9
return(celcius)
  }
```

```{r}
celf = fahr2cel(airtemps)
celf

```


now convert back to fahrenheight

```{r}
#i'm learining about Roxygen comments


#' Converts Celcius to Fahrenheit temperatures
#'
#' This would normally be the more detailed section of the documentation
#' but we don't really need it for this really simple fucntion
#' @param cel the temperature in degrees Celcius to be converted
#' @return the temperature in fahrenheit

cel2far = function(cel){
  far = cel*9/5 + 32
  return(far)
}

airtemp2 = cel2far(celf)
airtemp2

airtemps == airtemp2

```
